nodes.text: Sy Myrthian space was a portion of realspace controlled by the Sy Myrthian species. It shared its name with the Outer Rim Territories planet Sy Myrth, which was the homeworld of the Sy Myrthians Toonbuck Toora and Brookish Boon. A Hutt was based in Sy Myrthian space around the end of the Clone Wars in 19 BBY. The Hutt hired the Dressellian smuggler Has Obitt, who deemed his job to be tedious and menial.
Sy Myrthian space was mentioned in James Luceno's 2016 book Catalyst: A Rogue One Novel.
